title: Bear Species Quiz
description: Discover how much you know about the eight bear species found around the world

questions.question: Which bear species is the largest land carnivore in the world, with males weighing up to 1,500 pounds?
Which bear species has a distinctive white V-shaped or crescent-shaped patch on its chest?
Which bear is the only bear species native to South America?
Which is the smallest bear species in the world, found in the tropical forests of Southeast Asia?
Which bear species has a diet that consists of about 99% bamboo?
Which bear species from India has long, shaggy fur, a long muzzle, and specially adapted lips for sucking up insects?
What color is a polar bear's skin underneath its white-appearing fur?
Which subspecies of brown bear is found on Kodiak Island, Alaska, and rivals the polar bear in size?
Which bear gets its name from the markings around its eyes that resemble eyeglasses?
How many recognized species of bears exist in the world today?
Which bear species is known for having an exceptionally long tongue (up to 10 inches) used to extract honey from beehives?
Grizzly bears are a subspecies of which broader bear species?
Which bear species is the most common in North America, with a population estimated at around 800,000?
Which bear can run at speeds of up to 35 miles per hour despite its large size?
Which bear species is classified as a marine mammal because it spends much of its life on sea ice?
